item.title: Here's a quick Elasticsearch-Kibana setup via Docker for development
item.description: Are you new to the Elastic stack or configuring a new machine and need an easy way to setup, and a single command to run Elasticsearch & Kibana? Here’s a quick Elasticsearch-Kibana setup using Docker for your dev environment. Setup Install Docker for your OS. Pull the Docker image for Elasticsearch: docker pull docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.3.0 (you can change 7.3.0 to the latest or your preferred version). Pull the Docker image for Kibana: docker pull docker.
